text:
In my Windows ScriptInterpreterSource registry won't work. It works in 1.3.xx 
but it doesn't work in 2.0.35.
If I change the shebang line it works even if ScriptInterpreterSource registry 
is turned on. So I think Apache 2.0.35 ignores ScriptInterpreterSource 
registry!
My browser says:

Server error!

Error message: 
couldn't create child process: 22503: C:/XX/XXXXXX/XXXXXXX/cgi-bin/edit/edit.pl

If you think this is a server error, please contact the webmaster

Error 500
creator: redone@dds.nl
stoddard@apache.org
text: This has been fixed (by Bill Rowe) in 2.0.36.

creator: jerenkrantz@apache.org
text: Reopen to mark as duplicate of 7786.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7786 ***
creator: jerenkrantz@apache.org
